homePage.heroText: Hi, I am a frontend developer, logo designer and photo editor in Jos, Nigeria. Eager to expand knowledge and skills

aboutPage.brief: I'm Victor Umeokoli or Umeh for short living in Jos, plateau state Nigeria
aboutPage.skills: I am a frontend developer, logo & vector designer an aspiring blockchain developer.
aboutPage.hobbyDesc: I love hiking, reading fictional and comic books learning new things that catches my interest or that is for job.On my leisure time I watch soccer or animes.
aboutPage.skillsList: My technical skills and tools I work with are HTML, CSS,tailwindcss, SASS, styled-components, git, Javascript, Typescript, Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom and others .......
